Title: Enacts the "New York long term care trust act" and establishes the New York long term care trust program
Summary: Establishes the New York long term care trust program to provide long term care benefits for eligible residents who have paid the required premium contributions and are in need of assistance with at least three activities of daily living  as determined by the department of health.
LawCode: Add Art 36-B §§3670 - 3680, Pub Health L; add §§99-pp & 8-d, St Fin L; amd §§171-a, 171-h & 674, Tax L
